name: Shuttlecock-H Demo
detailed_description:
Warning! Full version of Shuttlecock-H graphically depicts sexual acts and is for adults only!


Shuttlecock-H is for all people who love fast action and cute girls. You have to collect hearts while avoiding bullets, lasers and other spacecrafts. Unlock more levels and naked pictures with your skill, persistence, and passion for seeing women... happy.



Features:
- fast, one-handed Bullet Hell gameplay
- challenging level of difficulty
- charming women to get
- japanese voice acting
- adrenaline pumping soundtrack

short_description: Shuttlecock-H is a Space Bullet Hell in the company of beautiful women. Win their hearts by dodging deadly bullets. Give them (and by chance yourself too) an orgasm out of this world!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Polish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This demo version contains a bit of nudity.
